title: University at Buffalo
description: The University at Buffalo's brand colors reflect a dynamic and vibrant identity, featuring shades such as 'UB Blue', a bold navy (005BBB); 'Saffron', a bright yellow (FFC72C); earthy tones like 'Chestnut' (990000); and 'Teal' (00A69C). These colors are used across various brand applications and are sourced directly from the university's official branding guidelines available at their website.
